buildCommand: mkdir -p .vercel_cache/public && if [ -d ".vercel_cache/public/thumbnails" ]; then cp -r .vercel_cache/public/thumbnails public/; fi && if [ -d ".vercel_cache/public/webp" ]; then cp -r .vercel_cache/public/webp public/; fi && pnpm install && pnpm run build && cp -r public/thumbnails .vercel_cache/public/ && cp -r public/webp .vercel_cache/public/
